text: Ana hu'negu zamatrege'za ana vahe'mokizmi mofavre naga'mo'za zamagaku hu'za nefrisage'za, mago'a vahera ha' vahe'mo'za e'za bainati kazinteti eme zamahe friho. Vene'ne naga'ene mofavre naga'enena eme zamahe vagaresnage'za a'nezmimo'za mofavrea onte kento a'nene maniho. Zamatrege'za ranra vahera kri eri'za nefrisagenka, nehazaveramina zamatrege'za bainati kazinteti hapi zamahe friho.
